wiki.summary: Incorrect tag for Don't Worry, Be Happy

track.name: Don't Worry Be Happy
comments: How can you not be happy when listening to this?
How can you not love this song
It will soon pass whatever it is
This is totally my guilty pleasure.
This is the best song in the world for when your feelin' down :)

I was just writing yet another paper for school thinking about the other 50 pages I have to write by next week, thinking wow.... Life sure does suck. then bam..... here it is the answer. wow this song came on at just the right moment. everyone should listen to it.
I reckon I just made my trouble double.
Читаем здесь об этой песне: http://song-story.ru/dont-worry-be-happy/
Always good for a gloomy Monday...
Don't worry uuu UUU uuu UUU uuuu.... Be happy uuu UUU uuu UUU uuuu .
not as good as I'm worried, need money
